2 ^ Deliver me from my enemies: 3 ^ Deliver me from them that work iniquity
O my God: and save me from bloody men.

2 ^ Deliver me from my enemies: 4 ^ For behold they have caught my soul~; the mighty have rushed in upon me.

and from them that rise up against me f: O Lord~; without iniquity have I run

2 ^ Deliver me from my enemies: 6 ^ Rise up thou to meet me
column6: attend to visit all the nations~; have no mercy on all them that work iniquity.

O my God: and shall suffer hunger as dogs
and from them that rise up against me f: and shall go round about the city.

2 ^ Deliver me from my enemies: 8 ^ Behold they shall speak with their mouth
O my God: and a sword is in their lips~; for who has heard~?

and from them that rise up against me f: shalt laugh at them~; thou shalt bring all the nations to nothing.

2 ^ Deliver me from my enemies: 10 ^ I will keep my strength to thee

O my God: his mercy shall prevent me~; God shall let me see over my enemies.
lest at any time my people forget. Scatter them by thy power

and from them that rise up against me f: and let them be taken in their pride. And for their cursing and lying they shall be talked of

O my God: when they are consumed by thy wrath
and from them that rise up against me f: and they shall be no more. And they shall know that God will rule Jacob
column4: and all the ends of the earth.

O my God: and shall suffer hunger as dogs
and from them that rise up against me f: and shall go round about the city.

2 ^ Deliver me from my enemies: 16 ^ They shall be scattered abroad to eat
O my God: if truely they shall not be filled

2 ^ Deliver me from my enemies: 17 ^ But I will sing thy strength
O my God: and will extol thy mercy in the morning. For thou art become my support
column4: in the day of my trouble.

O my God: will unto thee will I sing
and from them that rise up against me f: for thou art God my defence~; my God
